text: Steps are a British vocal pop group who formed in 1997. The members of the quintet are Lee Latchford-Evans, Claire Richards, Lisa Scott-Lee, Faye Tozer and Ian "H" Watkins. Steps have released seven studio albums. They released their first single "5,6,7,8" in 1997. == Other websites == *Official website Category:1997 establishments in England Category:1990s British music groups Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:British pop music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1997 Category:Musical groups from London
title: Steps (group)
